songs.title: Flower
songs.lyrics:
Track 1 of Fine Line (December 13, 2019) - Harry Styles - FLOWER

[VERSE 1]
Oh, flower
Smell so sweet and soft under my fingertips
I want to keep you forever

[VERSE 2]
Oh, flower
I'll take your thorns and sharp edges too
I want it all

[PRE-Chorus]
But baby, in the field where we go
We can be free and dance on the wind
No worries or cares

[Chorus]
Flower
Bring me hope
I promise I won't ever take you from your home
Give me a chance
Let me have this dance
I'll never leave you again

[VERSE 3]
Oh, flower
Your skin is like a petal and your eyes are like the sun
Your lips are like the rain

[VERSE 4]
Oh flower
Colors in your hair and you sway along the breeze
Share all your secrets with me

[PRE-Chorus] x1
[Chorus] x1

[BRIDGE]
I'm out here on the road
But I can only think of you
Us laying in the meadow
And forgetting what we do

Our complicated lives
And complicated dreams
Are gone for just a moment and
You're just a flower in the breeze

[Chorus] x2
[Chorus] Fade out...
